name: Falling Flat
description:
-Description-

User F14T_4EVA was made fun of on his flat earther forum for, surprise, saying the earth is flat.
But he isn't gonna take that from some dummy online.
So he's going on a little hang gliding trip to get proof that the earth is flat, deeper and deeper down a set of caverns to try and get out the other side of the planet!
Glide through 3 winding caverns on a quest for proof that the earth is actually flat, but in the end learn something you wish you hadn't... 

-Credits- 

Bonicle: Programing, level design, 3D modeling

Ultra Boo: Programing 

ADumbPotato: 3D modeling

CatCube: 2D art and textures, sound effects

-Extra Credits- 

Crash: Playtesting, helped with some smaller stuff, good friend, provided epic flaming sword cursor for the opening cutscene 

XementumU: Playtesting

Werti: Playtesting

Yaen: Playtesting

All music in this game was made by: onemansymphony.com

This was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam, we're planning on improving it as time goes on
